lexUnit.name: discontinue.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: stop doing, providing, or making.

sentence.text: The police are entitled to tell the person walking away from the scene to discontinue using his filthy language , which would in all likelihood constitute an offence under section 5 of the new Act .
The facts are that the patient has requested that the doctor discontinue treatment , and the doctor has ignored this request .
Is the doctor in breach of his duty to his patient if he discontinues treatment ?
So you see , in schools like that we would never go uniformed and we would have to discontinue visiting those schools as we would be jeopardizing the children and teachers .
Will he discontinue his pre-election pact with the Scottish National party in its all-or-nothing bid ?
The Senate reserves the right to discontinue at any time the studies of any student whose academic work proves unsatisfactory .
Presentations were later made at Afternoon Parties but these too were discontinued in 1958 .
The seven-day operation of the station was already discontinued with staff working Monday to Friday .

Common decided to discontinue further experiments because of the trouble and cost and passed the patterns to Thomas Brown and his son , iron-founders of Alnwick , who emigrated to New York State with them in 1824 .
Twenty seven of the 29 patients have discontinued oxygen therapy ; the median duration of this treatment was 4 months ( range 0.4 -20.4 ) .
If the baby remains well , discontinue that food and go on to test another one , again eating it every day for a week .
The Government must discontinue their stupid propaganda about empty properties and do something about them .
As a result he discontinued his visits .
Under President Reagan , such policies were discontinued .

The Concentrated Reinforcement Programme was discontinued since it was considered that the very marginal improvement that it had over the Standard programme was not worth the relatively more substantial increase in running costs .
The treatment was discontinued but about five minutes later he suddenly remembered the reason for his unusual reaction .
